name: RPS War
description:
RPS War is based on the rock paper scissor game. You can play it to test your luck against the computer and enjoy it.

RPS War will further be developed and launched on PC later this year instead of just being a Web game with a storyline and other things. So support the game by donation through itch.io or by becoming a patron throug https://www.patreon.com/manhaipictures.
